Plot: The dramatization of a motorcycle road trip Che Guevara went on in his youth that showed him his life's calling.
Title: The Motorcycle Diaries
Writer: Ernesto 'Che' Guevara (book), Alberto Granado (book), Jose Rivera (screenplay)
Actors: Gael García Bernal, Rodrigo De la Serna, Mía Maestro, Mercedes Morán
tomatoConsensus: The Motorcycle Diaries is heartfelt and profound in its rendering of the formative experiences that turn Ernesto "Che" Guerva into a famous revolutionary.
Country: Argentina, USA, Chile, Peru, Brazil, UK, Germany, France
